name: Eiroa - PCA Exclusive - 2022 60X6
additionalNotes: The Eiroa PCA Exclusive is a limited-edition, annual release cigar that is made available to members of the Premium Cigar Association (PCA) at their annual trade show. The cigars are handmade at the famed Aladino Cigar Factory in Honduras. Christian Luis Eiroa, the brand’s owner and master cigar crafter developed the blend.  Eiroa PCA Exclusive 2021 cigars feature a Cameroon-seed wrapper grown in Honduras, a Mexican binder, and fillers from Honduras and the Dominican Republic and available in three sizes.
